page.title: 06Our Policemen.
page.content: We do not have a police station in our area but come under the control of Liskeard station. At night the control is based at Launceston. Villages have been given their own{community {constable}who takes special care of his area. His duty day usually runs from 9 a.m.to 5 p.m., but sometimes he works in the evenings. The area is usually quiet but one problem is {vandalism.}A large amount of damage has been done in the last year. Local people say that it happens because we do not have a policeman living in the village. To help beat the vandals each Community Constable now has the help of a Sergeant. The policemen in our area are part of the{Devon and {Cornwall Constabulary.}They patrol the area in cars and keep in touch by radio. {Joanna Thomas. Dawn Christine Branch.
